channel.title: sprint on David Collantes
channel.description: Recent content in sprint on David Collantes

item.title: Sprint crookery
item.description: I am not happy with Sprint, I think it is a bad company. That, of course, is my opinion. I left them and took the hit of the early termination fee (ETF) because their service in my area was, and is, not usable. Even though I had documented the many times I called for not having reception, not able to make calls, and their “unlimited” data plan been unusable, I paid the ETF and decided to move on.
